title: Team-Based Agile Learning Curriculum for Innovative Surgical Resident Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Modeling and Data Analysis Knowledge, with Foundational Understanding of Surgical Clinical Environments
context.additional_context: Environment optimized for asynchronous collaborative learning using digital devices. Modular 5-day structure with 4-hour modules daily, including team project development and feedback sessions

learning_goals: Learners can derive three innovative ideas by applying mathematical modeling techniques for clinical problem-solving.
Learners progress through team projects using a sprint methodology, achieving one milestone per day.
Learners can evaluate peers' innovative ideas and propose improvements using quantitative and qualitative assessment criteria.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
